mainEntity.name: What services does Sumer Dabby offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Sumer Dabby offers Shopify app development, custom theme development, e-commerce solutions, React and Node.js web applications, checkout optimization, and technical consulting services.
Sumer Dabby is based in Ludhiana and Mohali, Punjab, India, and provides services locally and internationally.

mainEntity.name: What is Sumer Dabby's experience level?

acceptedAnswer.text: Sumer Dabby has 3+ years of professional experience in software development, specializing in Shopify development, React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

mainEntity.name: Is Sumer Dabby available for hire?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Sumer Dabby is currently available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Contact via email at sumerdabby123@gmail.com or phone at +91 9646865149.
